thread.title: By-election voting packs go out next week
thread.title_full: By-election voting packs go out next week

author: Fuseworks Media
title: By-election voting packs go out next week
text:
Fuseworks Media Friday, 2 October, 2015 - 12:33 
Voting packs for the Kaikohe-Hokianga Community Board by-election will be delivered by post to electors next week (from Tuesday 6 October 2015). 
A by-election is being held in the Kaikohe Subdivision as the result of an extraordinary vacancy on the board. Voting will close at noon on Wednesday 28 October 2015. 
Candidates contesting the seat on the board are: 
Any elector who believes they are eligible to vote, but hasnâ€™t received a voting document by Monday 12 October 2015 is advised to obtain a special voting pack from: 
Voting documents can be returned by post or hand-delivered to the above-mentioned Council office between Tuesday 6 October 2015 and Tuesday 27 October 2015 during normal office hours and on Wednesday 28 October 2015 until noon. 
Go to our Local Government Elections page for further information about the by-election, including candidate profile statements.
